body.name: HP Newest Laptop Computer, 14” HD Light PC, Intel Quad-Core Celeron N4120, 16GB DDR4 RAM, 576GB Storage, 1-Year Office 365, Windows 11, Long Battery Life, Webcam, USB-C, Wi-Fi 5, HDMI, Rose Gold, PCM
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 14 hrs 29 mins
features: [HIGH-DEFINITION DISPLAY, PORTABLE DESIGN] The HP laptop computer comes with a 14-inch HD (1366 x 768) micro-edge, BrightView display - Enjoy your entertainment with the vibrant clarity and high-definition detail of 1 million pixels. With its slim bezel and sleek design, an ultra-wide viewing experience provides for seamless multi-monitor set-ups, and you can easily take this thin and light laptop PC from room to room, or on the road

[ALL-DAY PERFORMANCE] The Quad-Core Intel Celeron N4120 (up to 2.6GHz, 4MB Cache) HP laptop has the perfect combination of performance, power consumption, and value to help your device handle multitasking smoothly and reliably. Smoothly stream 4K content and play your favorite games with the Intel UHD Graphics 600

[16GB DDR4 RAM + 576GB Storage] 16GB high-bandwidth DDR4 memory to smoothly run multiple applications and browser tabs all at once. 64GB high-speed eMMC (up to 15x faster than traditional HDD) provides reliable flash-based storage and fast bootup, and 512GB SD card offers ample storage for your files, documents, and multimedia

[Windows 11 Home in S mode] Experience the most secure Windows ever built with fast boot times, increased responsiveness, and added protection against phishing and malware. [Microsoft 365 Office] Get a boost for your creativity with Microsoft 365 - Word, Excel, and Power Point, now with smart assistance features, make your writing more readable, your data clearer and your presentations more visually powerful. One year subscription included.

[CONNECTIVITY AND PORTS] 1x SuperSpeed USB-C 3.1 (5 Gb/s signaling rate), 2x SuperSpeed USB-A 3.1 (5 Gb/s signaling rate), 1x HDMI 1.4b, Headphone/microphone combo jack, Wi-Fi 5 and Bluetooth combo (Gigabit data rate), up to 11.5 hours of battery life and HP Fast Charge, HP True Vision 720p HD camera with integrated digital microphone, HD Audio with B&O custom-tuned dual stereo speakers, 1-Year Limited Warranty, and a PCM earphone
body.description: Ideal for business, home and school, and with its slim and sleek design, micro-edge bezel display, and 79% screen to body ratio - take this thin and light 14” HP PC anywhere and see and do more. Powerful enough for your busiest days, this PC features an Intel processor and reliable flash-based storage at a great value. With a long battery life and fast-charge technology, this laptop lets you work, watch, and stay connected all day. Precision multi-touch touchpad speeds up both navigation and productivity. Your creativity gets a boost with 365 Office - Word, Excel, and Power Point now includes smart features to make work more productive and powerful. OS: Windows 11 Home in S Mode - Experience the most secure, high performing Windows ever built. Easily switch to Windows 11 by clicking “Switch out of S mode” under “Activation” in Windows setting Display: 14.0-inch, HD (1366 x 768), micro-edge, BrightView. Enjoy an immersive multimedia experience with a maximized viewing area and crispy visuals Processor: Intel Celeron N4120 (up to 2.6GHz burst frequency, 4MB cache, 4 cores, 4 threads) handles even the most arduous tasks without a hint of strain Memory: 16GB DDR4 RAM enables demanding multitasking capabilities Storage: 64GB eMMC (fast bootup and data access) + 512GB SD Card (ample storage) Graphics: Intel UHD 600 provides stunning image quality for internet use, photo editing and casual gaming Wireless: Wi-Fi 5 and Bluetooth 5 combo - experience great reliability and gigabit speed Camera: HP True Vision 720p HD camera with dual array digital microphones for video chat in vibrant clarity. B&O tuned dual stereo speakers for exceptional stereo quality Battery: Up to 11.5 hours runtime, HP Fast Charge (50% charge in 45 min) Ports: 1x SuperSpeed USB-C 3.1 + 2x SuperSpeed USB-A 3.1 - 5Gbps signaling rate (Data Transfer), 1x HDMI, Headphone/microphone combo jack

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I wish I would had slowed down an bought the touch screen! I didn’t not see it the day I was looking!A perfect computer to have one around the house so you don’t have to do stuff on your phone!I think it was definitely a bang for the buck
